text: Houston Faith Bible Institute enrollment
is now open for fall semester which
begins September
2024 we're accepting new students for
the fall so take a step of faith and
come join this Dynamic spirit filled
Bible training center right here in
Houston Texas the school is also online
where students can view classes live or
on demand and complete all exams online
using our easyto use student dashboard
and testing platform the school is for
everyone for those who send Ministry
call and for those who simply desire an
exciting Bible education that will
prepare you to fulfill the call of God
on your lives both in the kingdom of God
and in the world you're called
to our goal is to graduate strong
disciples and ministers who know their
Bible know their God and will succeed in
both Christian Life and gospel Ministry
go to hfbi
